qstnSbst: Q 04. What is the M COUNTDOWN?
ansrSbst: View to programs all about the K-Pop Stars’ live video, broadcast clips in Mnet. You can watch to a current show as it is transmitted live (On Air) or catch up with a programme after broadcast.

qstnSbst: Q 01. How can i reset my password?
ansrSbst: If you reset your password, click your profile.

qstnSbst: Q 02. Is it possible to edit my ID?
ansrSbst: No, ID is not possible to edit.
